name: Meng Huan: Xiang Shuai Chuan Qi Zhi Xue Hai Piao Ling
overview: In a certain port city, the bodies of three men floated ashore. A legendary detective with a white fan is called to solve the case. And from here the game begins, walking around the city and surrounding locations, talking to citizens, gathering evidence, talking again with the same people asking them for new evidence, and all this between battles with randomly encountered thugs, samurai, etc.
